tool.name: Preprocessing
tool.command:
preprocessing.sh
## Inputs -f $library.input1
## Barcode sequence -b '$library.barcode_seq'
## Trimming length -t $trim
## check if paired-end #if str( $library.type ) == "paired" -r $library.input2 #end if

param.name: type
param.label: Is this single or paired-end sequencing?

param.name: barcode_seq
param.label: Barcode sequence
param.help: Reads that do not start with the signature will be removed. Use IUPAC alphabet, e.g. NNNNXRTYNN as in the randomized part of the ligation adapter.

param.name: barcode_seq
param.label: Barcode sequence
param.help: Reads that do not start with the signature will be removed. Use IUPAC alphabet, e.g. NNNNXRTYNN as in the randomized part of the ligation adapter.

param.name: trim
param.label: 3' trimming length
param.help: Number of random bases for random priming, will be removed as they are likely to differ from a template.
